    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SECMCaptureDocumentWizardBuilder getInstance(Context context)
        Return a instance of SECMImageProcessingHelper. If it is first time, it returns a new instance. Otherwise, returns the existing instance.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for this method
        Returns:

      • start

        public void start()
        Open the wizard. If there is a pending document, shows a list with the images inside. Otherwise, shows options for capture a new image with camera and choose one from gallery.

      • setOnWizardFinishListener

        public void setOnWizardFinishListener(SECMCaptureDocumentWizardBuilder.OnWizardFinishListener listener)
        Register a callback to be invoked when the wizard is finished.
        Parameters:
        listener - The callback that will run
